title: 日本ダービーの後に・勝利のタグ！

text_block_list.text: The winner is Matikanetannhauser! The Tokyo Racecourse is stunned with surprise!
Meanwhile, Mihono Bourbon senses that Rice Shower will be a threat in the 'Kikuka Sho' and declares war. The audience is thrilled by the relationship between these two!
An equal amount of applause was directed at Matikanetannhauser as was sent to the two of them.
Some spectators frowned at this phenomenon, thinking, 'Isn't it disrespectful to Matitan?' But the person in question didn't mind at all.
On social media, her enthusiastic attitude about doing her best in the next 'Kikuka Sho' was seen as very positive and became a bit of a topic.
